# trackDataReadiness(_:)

**Instance Method**

Associates a sample buffer’s data readiness with that of another sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func trackDataReadiness(_ sampleBufferToTrack: CMSampleBuffer) throws
```

## Parameters

- **sampleBufferToTrack**: The sample buffer for which to track readiness.

## Discussion

After calling this method, retrieving the value of the [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/dataReadiness-swift.property] property retrieves the value from the tracked sample buffer. Likewise, calling the [doc://com.apple.coremedia/documentation/CoreMedia/CMSampleBuffer/makeDataReady()] method calls the tracked sample buffers method.

Use this method to convert a multi-sample buffer into single-sample buffer before the data is ready. The single-sample buffer tracks the data readiness of the multi-sample buffers.

## Determining Readiness

- **dataReadiness**: A value that indicates the status of the data the sample buffer contains.
- **setDataReadiness(_:)**: Sets the status of the sample buffer’s data.
- **CMSampleBuffer.DataReadiness**: Constants that indicate the readiness of a sample buffer’s data.
- **makeDataReady()**: Makes the sample buffer’s data ready for use by calling its handler closure.
